revised_title: Stress and Strain Analysis in a Partly Plastic Thick Tube under Internal Pressure and End-Load
tldr: The authors present a new total strain solution for the stress distribution in a partly plastic thick tube under internal pressure and end-load. They assume constant stress difference and no strain hardening, making fewer assumptions than previous solutions. The study provides values for the stresses and strains in the elastic and plastic zones, contributing to the understanding of stress distribution in thick tubes, particularly in the autofrettaging of gun barrels.
